price: ߌ ߞߴߌ ߣߍ߲߭ ߠߊߓߙߊ߬ߞߊ߬ߓߙߊߞߊ߫ ‹ ߘߐ߬ߛߊߙߌ › ߟߊ߫ ߞߌߢߍ ߡߵߊ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߘߋ߬
arabic: لَا تُحَرِّكۡ بِهِۦ لِسَانَكَ لِتَعۡجَلَ بِهِۦٓ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: lā tuḥarrik bihi lisānaka litaʿjala bihi
